results.title: John Lethbridge
results.creator_credit: Robert Lindsay, Judi Stack, Bob Weis, National Gallery of Victoria and Open Channel Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Survey (National Gallery of Victoria)”.
John Lethbridge’s works, his paintings, drawings and sculptural installations develop out of a personal necessity to try to give an order to the rituals and repeating experiences of life that recur in an apparently unordered and random world. His recent work can be described as “Post Conceptual Romanticism”
results.creator_credit_for_label: Robert Lindsay, Judi Stack, Bob Weis, National Gallery of Victoria and Open Channel Productions

results.title: Ewa Pachucka
results.creator_credit: National Gallery of Victoria and Open Channel Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “Survey (National Gallery of Victoria)”.
Ewa Pachucka is a sculptor who works with a crochet hook and string to create total environment works of landscapes and bodies

results.title: Simple looms. Part 1
results.creator_credit: Ken J. Widdowson and John Gray
results.brief_description: A how-to-do it program intended to provide the viewer with the confidence, skill and interest to try it for themselves. Suggestions are given on how inspiration and ideas may be drawn from the natural world for weaving design themes.

results.title: Half and Half
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “School’s Out”.
Prejudice, language and cultural differences are among the difficulties faced in school by migrant children. After school the problems are more pronounced: they feel halfway between their parents’ culture and the Australian lifestyle

results.title: Trespass on Summerland
results.creator_credit: Brighton Grammar School (Vic.). Film Makers Club
results.brief_description: A few boys enjoying a camping holiday are evicted from their camp by an irate farmer. They later save his son trapped on a precipitous cliff face. (Awards: 2nd prize at the International Contest for Young Film Makers, Milan, Italy)

results.title: Stamina
results.brief_description: A film illustrating the manufacture of Stamina trousers and showing the care exercised in all stages. The various processes are shown together with a brief history of men’s dress and the sewing machine.

results.title: Spread your wings: making it with TAFE
results.creator_credit: John O'Shea, Chris Stewart, Technical and Further Education and Documentary Films
results.brief_description: An impressionistic film which is intended to provide information about the opportunities offered by Technical and Further Education in vocational training, and in recreational courses to meet community requirements. It is not intended to give detailed information on the breadth of courses and curricula but is rather a stimulus film aimed at encouraging enrolment.
